mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERIDX, NAME AS receiverName, PHONE, ADDRNAME AS addName, ADDRTITLE AS addTitle, ADDRDETAIL AS addDetail, FIRSTADDR AS firstAdd, postcode as postCode FROM MEMBER_ADDRESS WHERE MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx} order by ADDR_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_ADDRESS (addr_num, memberidx, name, phone, addrname, ADDRTITLE, ADDRDETAIL, FIRSTADDR, POSTCODE) values (SEQ_MEMBER_ADDRESS.nextval, #{memberIdx}, #{receiverName}, #{phone}, #{addName}, #{addTitle}, #{addDetail}, #{firstAdd}, #{postCode})
